homeHeader.title: Operate at the Crossroads of Trade, Tech, and Talent in DWTC Free Zone with Our End-to-End Business Solutions
homeHeader.description: Launch in DWTC FZ’s thriving business landscape to unlock global exposure, futuristic infrastructure, and unmatched flexibility to reach fast-growing global markets in the MENA and GCC regions. Our seasoned business consultants empower you to scale your startup in Dubai’s hyper-competitive landscape with cost-efficient and flexible setup solutions.

leftSection_1.title: Why Founders Choose Dubai World Trade Center Free Zone
leftSection_1.description: Enjoy complete strategic ownership of your business, 100% capital repatriation, and a strong community of 1800+ businesses by launching in DWTC.

items.title: Gain Unmatched Global Connectivity

items.title: Lower Tax Liabilities
items.subTitle: Lower Tax Liabilities
items.description: Unlock limitless business growth with complete foreign ownership, 0% corporate and personal income tax, and 100% import-export tariffs for 50+ years.

items.title: Streamline Multi-Currency Exchange
items.subTitle: Streamline Multi-Currency Exchange
items.description: Maximise business revenue with DWTC’s minimal FX and international wire charges. Send, receive, and hold in 70+ currencies, retain more of your profits, and reinvest in core business activities.

leftSection_5.title: Simplify DWTC Company Formation with Our 5-Step Process

items.title: Choose a Legal Structure
items.description: We’ll schedule a no-obligations call to discuss your business nature and help select the best-fit business form and activity.

items.title: Prepare Your Documents
items.description: Next, our expert consultants will help you compile the necessary documents, including passport copies & NOC’s.

items.title: Register a Trade Name
items.description: We’ll assist in brainstorming, searching, and securing a unique, DED-compliant business name.

items.title: Secure Initial Approvals
items.description: Our business specialists will then assist you in obtaining the necessary approvals and permits from the DWTC Authority.

items.title: Apply and Issue a License
items.description: Lastly, we’ll help you lease or rent an office space, fill out the paperwork, and secure your license within a week.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Do I need a local sponsor or agent to set up in the DWTC Free Zone?
items.answer: No, DWTC FZ offers 100% foreign ownership, empowering you to skip the hassle of partnering with a local sponsor.

items.question: What documents do I need to launch in DWTC Free Zone?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need a professional business plan, passport copies, board resolution, Emirates ID copies, MoA, and good standing certificate, depending on your selected legal structure and business activity.

items.question: Can I bundle business activities in the DWTC Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, Dubai World Trade Center FZ allows you to bundle 10+ business activities under a single license.

items.question: Does DWTC Free Zone offer businesses tax exemptions?
items.answer: Yes, you can benefit from 100% corporate and personal income tax exemptions, as well as zero import-export duties in the DWTC Free Zone.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me register my DWTC company remotely?
items.answer: Yes, our expert business consultants offer 100% remote company formation solutions, empowering you to launch and operate from any corner of the world.
